message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 to me due to its unique features and benefits. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response.
